4.1.5. References

  • IEA. (2023). World Energy Outlook 2023. https://www.iea.org/reports/world-energy-outlook-2023

  • MSET. (2018a). An Overview of Jamaica’s Electricity Sector. https://www.mset.gov.jm/electricity-investments/

  • MSET. (2018b). PETROLEUM PRICES FOR SELECTED PRODUCTS. https://www.mset.gov.jm/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/PETROLEUM-PRICES-2018.pdf

  • MSET. (2020). 2018 Jamaica Integrated Resource Plan. https://www.mset.gov.jm/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/2018-Jamaica-Integrated-Resource-Feb-21-2020.pdf

  • MSET. (2023). Energy Balances. https://www.mset.gov.jm/document-category/energy-balances/

  • JPS. (2015). 2015 Submission Annual Tariff Adjustment. https://our.org.jm/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/jps_2015_annual_tariff_new_submission_june_22_2015.pdf

  • JPS. (2022a). 2022 Submission Annual Tariff Adjustment. https://our.org.jm/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/JPS-Annual-Filing-2022-FINAL_May-10-2022.pdf

  • JPS. (2023b). 2023 Submission Annual Tariff Adjustment. https://our.org.jm/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/JPS-2023-Annual-Filing_May-5-2023.pdf

  • ScieLAC-OLADE. (2022). Electric Generation. https://sielac.olade.org/WebForms/Reportes/ReporteDato7.aspx?oc=51&or=30102&ss=2&v=1

  • SieLAC-OLADE. (2022). Installed Capacity. https://sielac.olade.org/WebForms/Reportes/ReporteDato7.aspx?oc=181&or=392&ss=2&v=1

  • PIOJ. (2022). Economic and Social Survey Jamaica 2022: Selected Indicators & Overview. https://www.pioj.gov.jm/product/economic-and-social-survey-jamaica-2022-selected-indicators-overview/

  • Argus Media. (2023). Energy Argus Petroleum Coke (Version Issue 23-1) [Dataset]. https://www.argusmedia.com/-/media/Files/sample-reports/argus-latin-markets.ashx

  • Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change. (2006). 2006 IPCC Guidelines for National Greenhouse Gas Inventories, Volume 2: Energy, Chapter 2: Stationary Combustion. https://www.ipcc-nggip.iges.or.jp/public/2006gl/pdf/2_Volume2/V2_2_Ch2_Stationary_Combustion.pdf
